title: [DSA] - Darkstar Alliance - Looking for new recruits

embed.description: For Australia and NZ MWO, Star Citizen and other gaming, come visit the Darkstar Alliance

body:
DarkStar Alliance is a Aus/NZ casual gaming guild with teamspeak and forums.
_Whilst our league focus is OCE, our player base is world wide_

We have a mature and relaxed atmosphere. Our members play a broad range of games.
_DSA was founded back in 1999 so we're well established and we're here to stay._

>We host competitive and fun events every **FRIDAY NIGHT** at 7pm AEST such as 1v1 and 2v2 tournaments, inhouses, and _Custom Game Modes_ (including such favourites as Ultimate Bravery and Protect the SorakaBot).

>If you are looking for more serious play, we host scheduled **_DSA Ranked 5s Nights_**. We also are trying to set up some teams to enter online tournaments, as well as a high skilled team to enter OOL etc.

**If you would like to join us**
1. Visit our [website](http://darkstar-alliance.com/) and register via the 'Join DSA' tab.
2. Download teamspeak - our teamspeak is found at ts.darkstar-alliance.com:7465
3. Once you have applied, jump onto our teamspeak and poke someone to get your permissions. We are all pretty friendly :D

Visitors are always welcome to come along as well.
No matter what you're into, casual or hardcore, come check us out!
